scripts.vercel-build: yum install -y wget alien && wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && alien -r google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb && yum install -y ./google-chrome-stable*.rpm || true && mkdir -p /tmp/chromedriver && cp bin/chromedriver /tmp/chromedriver/chromedriver
